#Recruitment outcomes of individuals screened for eligibility according to BMI Type 
```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
outcomes_BMI <- Phone_Screen_age_bmi %>% select(BMI, Outcomes) %>% na.omit()

vtree(outcomes_BMI, "BMI Outcomes", palette=3, sortfill=TRUE, horiz=TRUE)

#chi squared analysis
contingency_table <- table(outcomes_BMI$BMI, outcomes_BMI$Outcomes)

chi_squared_test <- chisq.test(contingency_table)

chi_squared_test

```
